# VerticalFineStrategy enumeration

Defines the strategy of the fine vertical point of the element to be inserted.

```csharp
public enum VerticalFineStrategy
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Top | `0` | Sets the fine vertical position at top of origin container. |
| Middle | `1` | Sets the fine vertical position at middle of origin container. |
| Bottom | `2` | Sets the fine vertical position at bottom of origin container. |
